** Wedbush Securities says it is bullish on tech stocks for 2022 despite Omicron fears, concerns of a tighter Federal Reserve policy, and constrained valuation framework for tech shares

** Says Apple Inc AAPL.O will launch Apple Glasses in summer of 2022, which will be a growth trigger for the stock

** Brokerage expects M&A activity in the metaverse space to boom, seeing its hype translate into reality with billions in investment from big tech players like Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O, Microsoft MSFT.O, AAPL, Meta Platforms FB.O and Alphabet Inc's GOOGL.O Google

** "Our 2022 year-end target for NASDAQ is 19K driven by the digital transformation among enterprises and consumers" - Wedbush Securities

** Says the volume of enterprises and governments pivoting workloads to the cloud will exceed 50% next year driving growth for AMZN, MSFT, Google, Oracle ORCL.O and IBM IBM.N

** Brokerage names data co Matterport MTTR.O, cybersecurity players Varonis VRNS.O and Sailpoint SAIL.N, and software firms Rapid7 RPD.O and Cerence CRNC.O as its top 5 M&A candidates for 2022 in tech

** Expects more investments to pivot out of China tech towards US tech stocks in 2022, amid uncertain regulatory environment in China


(Reporting by Chavi Mehta in Bengaluru)
